# Changelog

## 0.1.2 (2016-05-14)

- Updated dependency
- Removed use of deprecated connect() method 

## 0.1.1 (2015-05-28)

- Literal expansion now encodes any characters that are not
  reserved/unreserved/pct-encoded, as outlined in Section 3.1. Literal Expansion
  of the specification.

## 0.1.0 (2015-05-27)

- Initial release
